game_summary: In an electrifying NBA showdown, the Warriors narrowly defeated the Lakers in a high-scoring battle.
play_by_play:
1st Quarter:
Warriors surge ahead with quick three-pointers and fast-break dunks; lead 30-28.
2nd Quarter:
Lakers close the gap with efficient ball movement; halftime score 62-60 Warriors.
3rd Quarter:
Both teams exchange scoring runs in a high-octane period; Warriors up 90-87.
4th Quarter:
Clutch shooting from downtown secures a dramatic finish; final score 120-115.
END GAME

game_summary: In a thrilling NHL overtime battle, the Sharks edged out the Predators in a game full of momentum swings.
play_by_play:
1st Period:
Sharks capitalize on a power play to take a 1-0 lead.
2nd Period:
Predators tie the game at 1-1 with a penalty kill advantage.
3rd Period:
Both teams struggle to break through; score remains tied.
Overtime:
A swift breakaway by the Sharks results in the winning goal; final score 3-2 OT.
END GAME

game_summary: In one of the fiercest El Clásico matches, Real Madrid and Barcelona battled to a dramatic 2-2 draw.

[00:00] Kick-off.

[28'] Barcelona responds with a precise set-piece equalizer.
[45+2'] Half-time, score 1-1.
[60'] Real Madrid strikes again from long range.
[75'] Barcelona is awarded a penalty but misses the conversion.
[90+3'] Barcelona levels with a header; final score 2-2.
END GAME

game_summary: A nail-biting Premier League clash saw Manchester City edge past Liverpool in a game filled with twists and tactical brilliance.

[00:00] Kick-off.

[23'] Liverpool answers with a clinical finish to tie the game.
[35'] A set-piece goal gives City the lead.
[55'] Liverpool’s near-miss on a powerful shot hits the post.
[75'] In stoppage time, City clinches the win with a decisive goal; final score 3-2.
END GAME

game_summary: In a thrilling NBA contest, the Toronto Raptors edged out the Boston Celtics in a fast-paced, high-scoring battle.

game_summary: In a high-stakes NFL showdown, the Eagles narrowly fell to the Chiefs in a game marked by explosive plays and last-minute heroics.
play_by_play:
Eagles Kickoff: Touchback.
1st Quarter:
A long touchdown pass propels the Eagles to a 7-0 lead.
2nd Quarter:
Chiefs answer with a field goal, tying the score at 7-7.
3rd Quarter:
A critical turnover leads to a Chiefs touchdown, extending their lead to 14-7.
4th Quarter:
A late drive culminates in a game-sealing field goal; final score 31-28.
